rules_text:
Foreshadow 4–{3}{RG} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with four time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
Spirit of Chaos attacks each turn if able.
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.
